channel.title: Dueling ring/cooking timer pi
channel.description: hey guys, my first question is does anyone know the code for a cooking timer, iv never seen one nor had one and i really need one. secondly does anyone have the code for 100% dueling ring, mine works perfectly fine but it doesn't lose charges after use. thankyou.

edit: it worked tytytytyytytytytyty.

item.title: Dueling ring/cooking timer pi
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

[quote=“s w 3 3 t1, post:12, topic:393063”]so am i adding this in itemclick2?
thankyou.[/quote]
Should be it, just add this in there, seeing as it will probably be a switch statement, add it before or after the switch statement.

if (itemId >= 2552 && itemId <= 2566) { if (itemId != 2566) { c.getItems().deleteItem(itemId, 1); c.getItems().addItem(itemId + 2, 1); } else { c.getItems().deleteItem(itemId, 1); c.sendMessage("You have used all ring of dueling charges."); } } }

Read full topic

item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

[quote=“s w 3 3 t1, post:10, topic:393063”]i know what is wrong i just don’t know the code im missing.
it doesn’t lose charges when i use it[/quote]
add this

public void handleROD(int itemId) { if (itemId != 2566) { c.getItems().deleteItem(itemId, 1); c.getItems().addItem(itemId + 2, 1); } else { c.getItems().deleteItem(itemId, 1); c.sendMessage("You have used all ring of dueling charges."); } }
to where you item second click is handleded. Odds are the method for deleting it is never called.

item.title: Dueling ring/cooking timer pi
item.dc:creator: @s_w_3_3_t1 s w 3 3 t1
item.description:
@s_w_3_3_t1 wrote:

i dont know & where would i add that?

edit: this is all the codes i could find.

this is in itemclick3

case 2552:
		case 2554:
		case 2556:
		case 2558:
		case 2560:
		case 2562:
		case 2564:
		case 2566:
			c.getPA().handleROD(itemId);
		break;

this is in playerassistance

public void handleROD(int gloryId) {
		c.getDH().sendOption2("Duel Arena", "Castle Wars");
		c.usingROD = true;
                c.usingGlory = false;
		c.usingGamesNeck = false;
	}
	
	public void handleROD() {
		if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(2552, 1)) {
		c.getItems().deleteItem(2552, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(2554, 1);
		}
		else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(2554, 1)) {
		c.getItems().deleteItem(2554, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(2556, 1);
		}
		else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(2556, 1)) {
		c.getItems().deleteItem(2556, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(2558, 1);
		}
		else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(2558, 1)) {
		c.getItems().deleteItem(2558, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(2560, 1);
		}
		else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(2560, 1)) {
		c.getItems().deleteItem(2560, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(2562, 1);
		}
		else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(2562, 1)) {
		c.getItems().deleteItem(2562, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(2564, 1);
		}
		else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(2564, 1)) {
		c.getItems().deleteItem(2564, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(2566, 1);
		}
		else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(2566, 1)) {
		c.getItems().deleteItem(2566, 1);
		c.sendMessage("You have used all ring of dueling charges.");
		}
	}

Read full topic

item.title: Dueling ring/cooking timer pi
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

what part of the dueling ring code are you missing? Also there is an easier way to go about switching rings on use…

public void handleROD(int itemId) { if (itemId != 2566) { c.getItems().deleteItem(itemId, 1); c.getItems().addItem(itemId + 2, 1); } else { c.getItems().deleteItem(itemId, 1); c.sendMessage("You have used all ring of dueling charges."); } }

Read full topic

im a little confussed and do i add the c.handleROD.handleROD(); under the code i just showed you? and i dont get the bit about the client.

and also this is in my clickingbuttons

if (c.usingROD) c.getPA().startTeleport(3360, 3213, 0, "modern"); c.getPA().removeAllWindows(); c.getPA().handleROD(); break;

Read full topic

item.title: Dueling ring/cooking timer pi
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

in your dialogHandler.java you need to add right after the teleport. you need to add something similar to this

c.handleROD.handleROD();

i dont know what your filename is but it would
go to client go to fileName then .Void you would want.
c.FileName.Void
more or less the way to do it.
Sounds like right now it is doing the teleport and you have it already defined you just dont have the delete proccess added.

you didnt post your dialogueHandler.java so i can’t add it.

Read full topic

item.title: Dueling ring/cooking timer pi
item.dc:creator: @s_w_3_3_t1 s w 3 3 t1
item.description:
@s_w_3_3_t1 wrote:

this is part of my code idk if it’s all of it.

[code]
public void handleROD(int gloryId) {
c.getDH().sendOption2(“Duel Arena”, “Castle Wars”);
c.usingROD = true;
c.usingGlory = false;
c.usingGamesNeck = false;
}

public void handleROD() {
	if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(2552, 1)) {
	c.getItems().deleteItem(2552, 1);
	c.getItems().addItem(2554, 1);
	}
	else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(2554, 1)) {
	c.getItems().deleteItem(2554, 1);
	c.getItems().addItem(2556, 1);
	}
	else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(2556, 1)) {
	c.getItems().deleteItem(2556, 1);
	c.getItems().addItem(2558, 1);
	}
	else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(2558, 1)) {
	c.getItems().deleteItem(2558, 1);
	c.getItems().addItem(2560, 1);
	}
	else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(2560, 1)) {
	c.getItems().deleteItem(2560, 1);
	c.getItems().addItem(2562, 1);
	}
	else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(2562, 1)) {
	c.getItems().deleteItem(2562, 1);
	c.getItems().addItem(2564, 1);
	}
	else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(2564, 1)) {
	c.getItems().deleteItem(2564, 1);
	c.getItems().addItem(2566, 1);
	}
	else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(2566, 1)) {
	c.getItems().deleteItem(2566, 1);
	c.sendMessage("You have used all ring of dueling charges.");
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic
